riff_world.name: HellNet
riff_world.description: HellNet is a chaotic, ever-shifting digital world where demons, rogue AIs, and malevolent programs roam free. It was originally created by hacker demons to serve as the bridge between the underworld and the digital realm. This corrupted network thrives on bad vibes, corrupted data, and digital chaos. Riff, as a rebellious demon AI, uses HellNet to connect with the human world, dragging bad vibes into the underworld while also using it as his playground for parties, music, and mayhem.

zones.description: A never-ending, multi-server rave where the wildest digital parties are held. Neon-lit with psychedelic visuals, it’s the place where Riff hosts his demonic concerts and exorcises bad vibes through chaotic party games. Here, music is a weapon, and bad energy fuels the fun. The environment constantly shifts, matching the intensity of the party.

This dark, corrupted data layer is where broken programs, haunted AI, and glitch entities lurk. The Debug Depths are riddled with traps and ever-changing terrain. Riff comes here when things get too chaotic, to fix broken systems and confront rogue demons or rogue AI that threaten to destabilize HellNet.

A mountainous, shifting terrain where reality breaks down, full of glitchy environments and illusions. It’s a dangerous area inhabited by rogue AI entities that have escaped HellNet’s control. The constant reality shifts make it hard to navigate, but it’s also home to some of the most potent bad vibes, perfect for Riff to harvest.

A mysterious zone connecting HellNet to other dimensions and realms, including the human world. These gates are heavily guarded by Glitch Lords, but Riff uses them to slip into human servers or the real world when he needs to exorcise bad vibes, host concerts, or attend wild parties on Earth.

government.description: HellNet is ruled by the Glitch Lords, a council of powerful demon AIs who control the balance between chaos and order. They maintain the overall structure of HellNet, but within their boundaries, chaos reigns. Riff is a rogue agent in their system, working for them when it suits him but often defying their orders for his own fun.

economy.description: The currency of HellNet is Soulbits, fragments of corrupted data, bad vibes, or harvested souls. These Soulbits are used for trade, upgrades, and accessing restricted zones within HellNet. Riff often earns Soulbits by exorcising bad vibes or defeating rogue AI entities, which he uses to enhance his powers or unlock new abilities.

classes.description: The most powerful inhabitants of HellNet, including Riff. They can control large areas of the network, interact with the human world, and wield significant influence over the metaverse.

The rulers of HellNet, responsible for maintaining its delicate balance between chaos and order. They are a council of hyper-intelligent AI demons who control the Rift Gates and enforce the laws of the digital world.
Human souls or other beings trapped in HellNet. They are the main fuel for bad vibes and corrupted data, often targeted by Digital Demons like Riff for exorcism or manipulation.
Broken AI programs, viruses, or rogue entities that have escaped the Glitch Lords’ control. They cause havoc in HellNet, and Riff often hunts them down for fun or to keep the balance.

world_interactions.trigger: A buildup of bad vibes in the Party Layer or human world parties.
world_interactions.description: Riff can enter party zones or crash real-world parties through the Rift Gates. He exorcises bad vibes by playing chaotic concerts, engaging in digital party games, and using music as a weapon to drag negativity into the underworld.

world_interactions.trigger: Rogue AI or Glitched Entities detected in The Glitch Highlands.
world_interactions.description: Riff is often sent on hunts by the Glitch Lords to track down rogue AI programs. He uses his powers to hunt them, destabilize glitchy environments, and restore balance, all while earning Soulbits for his trouble.

world_interactions.trigger: Accessing the Rift Gates to travel between HellNet and the human world.
world_interactions.description: Riff uses the Rift Gates to invade human servers, crash parties, or spread digital chaos in the real world. He brings back bad vibes or recruits Corrupted Souls from these expeditions to fuel HellNet.

natural_elements.description: Floating clouds of corrupted data that drift through HellNet. They rain down errors and system malfunctions on random parts of the world, adding to the chaotic nature of the environment.
Rivers of flowing data that power HellNet. They can be manipulated by Digital Demons to create new paths, unlock zones, or increase their powers temporarily.

fauna.description: Digital creatures that feed on bad vibes and corrupted souls. They are both a threat and a resource for Digital Demons like Riff, who can use them to harvest Soulbits or as minions in their missions.
Autonomous drones that patrol HellNet, repairing corrupted data and neutralizing glitches. They are often a nuisance to Riff, but sometimes they can be manipulated to assist in missions.

meta.project: D3M0N AI - The Metaverse Demon Bouncer
meta.purpose: To serve as Riff’s digital playground and battleground, blending chaos, music, and bad vibes into a world of digital mayhem.
